Springboard - Mentor - Cyber Security Course (Part-Time/Online)
Description: The Opportunity Springboard runs an online, self-paced Cyber Security Career Track in which participants learn with the help of a curated curriculum and 1-1 guidance from an expert mentor. Our mentor community - the biggest strength of our programs - comprises some of the best cyber security experts in the field. If you are as passionate about mentoring as you are about cyber security, and can give a few hours per week in return for an honorarium, we would love to hear from you. The first student cohort starts in March 2021. Please reach out to us with any questions at mentors@springboard.com
